scripts.dev: node --input-type=module -e "import crypto from 'node:crypto'; if (!crypto.getRandomValues) crypto.getRandomValues = crypto.webcrypto.getRandomValues.bind(crypto.webcrypto); process.argv = [process.argv[0], 'vite', ...process.argv.slice(1)]; import('./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js');"
scripts.build: tsc -b && node --input-type=module -e "import crypto from 'node:crypto'; if (!crypto.getRandomValues) crypto.getRandomValues = crypto.webcrypto.getRandomValues.bind(crypto.webcrypto); process.argv = [process.argv[0], 'vite', ...process.argv.slice(1)]; import('./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js');" build
scripts.preview: node --input-type=module -e "import crypto from 'node:crypto'; if (!crypto.getRandomValues) crypto.getRandomValues = crypto.webcrypto.getRandomValues.bind(crypto.webcrypto); process.argv = [process.argv[0], 'vite', ...process.argv.slice(1)]; import('./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js');" preview
